amendment.description: To ensure that the benefits under the Millennium Challenge Assistance program are available for the intended beneficiaries, including women and girls.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1196 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1196 proposed by Senator Lugar for Senator Durbin to Amendment SA 1136. (consideration: CR S9203-9205; text: CR S9204) To ensure that the benefits under the Millennium Challenge Assistance program are available for the intended beneficiaries, including women and girls.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1196 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1196 proposed by Senator Lugar for Senator Durbin to Amendment SA 1136.
